name: aps-mcp
description: MCP server for Autodesk Platform Services: get tokens, list hubs, and call APS APIs.

tools.name: aps_get_token
tools.description: Get a 2-legged access token for Autodesk Platform Services. Use to verify credentials or before calling other APS APIs.

tools.name: aps_list_hubs
tools.description: List hubs (top-level containers) in APS Data Management.

aps_client_id.title: APS Client ID
aps_client_id.description: Your Autodesk Platform Services app Client ID (from aps.autodesk.com)

aps_scope.title: APS OAuth scope(s)
aps_scope.description: Space-separated scopes (e.g. data:read or data:read data:write). Default: data:read
